title: How Bora-Hansgrohe Snatched Away Primož Roglič: ‘We could tell he was not really happy’
content:
The story behind the biggest coup of the transfer season: 'If you add a zero to the number, it is not enough.'

Read the full article at How Bora-Hansgrohe Snatched Away Primož Roglič: ‘We could tell he was not really happy’ on Velo.
author: ahood
